word:
One sister wrote me that she had three hundred dollars to create a fund for educating our youth in the school at Avondale. The money is to be lent to students, and when they earn means, they are to replace it for some other youth to use. It is a good idea. The money is in the Pacific Press, to be sent to me.--Letter 130, 1898. 









Ellen G. White Estate 
Silver Spring, Maryland 
January 17, 1991. Entire Letter.
